Title: Gogoler Kirti
Writer: Samaresh Basu (story), Smaranjit Chakraborty (screenplay), Pompy Ghosh Mukherjee (screenplay)
Actors: Shakuntala Barua, Biswajit Chakraborty, Bhaswar Chatterjee, Locket Chatterjee
Plot: Based on Samaresh's popular Gogol fiction Mahish Mardini Uddhar and Rai Raja Uddhar, the film unfolds with a 'sabeki' puja in a Bengal village, where all members of the once-royal household...
